pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dyadic Network Analysis // Contains functions for the MCMC simulation of dyadic network models j2 (Zijlstra, 2017, doi:10.1080/0022250X.2017.1387858) and p2 (Van Duijn, Snijders Zijlstra, 2004, doi: 10.1046/j.0039-0402.2003.00258.x) as described in Zijlstra, Van Duijn Snijders (2009) doi: 10.1348/000711007X255336.
